lead_paragraph: Hector Santiago allowed three hits and no walks over five scoreless innings, Yunel Escobar had a pair of RBI singles and the Los Angeles Angels beat the Los Angeles Dodgers 5-1 Friday night.

headline.print_headline: Santiago Sharp for Angels in 5-1 Win Over Dodgers
headline.main: Santiago Sharp for Angels in 5-1 Win Over Dodgers
